channel.title: Help with creating a item command (with restrictions)

item.title: Help with creating a item command (with restrictions)
item.dc:creator: @shank_beast shank beast
item.description:
@shank_beast wrote:

Hey guys, i have a server and i alowed spawn however, if the player spawns above 6000+ they get nulled or there account freezez and they cannt login. i want to add restrictions so nobody can spawn above 6000. please help here’s my spawn command

if(playerCommand.startsWith(“item”))
c.getItems().addItem(Integer.parseInt(split[1]), Integer.parseInt(split[2]));

Read full topic
item.source: Help with creating a item command (with restrictions)
